info.title: PurviewDataQuality
info.description:
Purview Data Quality Service is a fully managed cloud service whose users can
run Data Quality Job to get some score. This spec defines REST API of Purview
Data Quality Service.

AssetMetadataObserver.description: Represents metadata observer entity for a data asset.

dataAsset.description: Reference to the associated DataAsset entity.

createdAt.description: Timestamp when the observer was created.

lastModifiedAt.description: Timestamp when the observer was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: User who last modified the observer.

isDeleted.description: Indicates if the observer is deleted.

businessDomain.description: Reference to the related BusinessDomain entity.

dataProduct.description: Reference to the related DataProduct entity.

AssetMetadataObserverResponse.description: Represents metadata observer entity for a data asset.

dataAsset.description: Reference to another entity (BusinessDomain, DataProduct, DataAsset).

businessDomain.description: Reference to another entity (BusinessDomain, DataProduct, DataAsset).

dataProduct.description: Reference to another entity (BusinessDomain, DataProduct, DataAsset).

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

message.description: A human-readable representation of the error.

details.description: An array of details about specific errors that led to this reported error.

innererror.description: An object containing more specific information than the current object about the error.

Azure.Core.Foundations.InnerError.description: An object containing more specific information about the error. As per Azure REST API guidelines - https://aka.ms/AzureRestApiGuidelines#handling-errors.

code.description: One of a server-defined set of error codes.

Column.description: Represents a column in a dataset.

DataSourceEntity.description: Represents a data source entity with metadata, configuration, and optional scopes.

name.description: The display name of the data source connection.

id.description: Unique identifier for the data source.

isVnetEnabled.description: Indicates whether the data source is enabled with Virtual Network (VNet).

targetResourceId.description: The Azure resource ID of the target resource (if applicable).

businessDomain.description: The business domain this data source belongs to.

referenceId.description: Unique identifier for the business domain.

lastModifiedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the data source was last modified.

lastModifiedBy.description: Identifier (GUID or user ID) of the last modifier.

type.description: The type of the data source (e.g., AzureSqlDatabase, Snowflake, AzureSynapseAnalytics).

typeProperties.description:
A dictionary of key-value pairs with additional properties
specific to the data source type.

scopes.description: Optional list of scopes that define access levels or boundaries for this data source.

scope.description: The scope definition containing type and included objects.

includes.description: List of included items in the scope.

redundancyCheck.description: Indicates if redundancy check is enabled.

submissionTime.description: Timestamp when the job was submitted.

runId.description: Unique run identifier for the job.

submissionTime.description: Timestamp when the job was submitted.

cancelRequestTime.description: Timestamp when a cancel request was made.

duration.description: Duration of the job in milliseconds.

scheduleId.description: Schedule identifier if job is scheduled.

scheduleName.description: Schedule name if job is scheduled.

qualifiedPath.description: Fully qualified path related to the job.

scanId.description: Scan identifier associated with the job.

jobBillingSparkSku.description: Spark SKU used for job billing.

value.description: The RuleParameters items on this page

nextLink.description: The link to the next page of items
